TopicTitle: Steam version of Kerbal wont update to 1.0

Articles.Content:
Didnt see this one here, but I had a hell of a time getting the 1.0 update. Uninstalled and reinstalled from steam several times, and the launcher was greyed out for "check for updates"

The solution, come to find out, is to opt OUT of the beta in steam. It seems if you are still in beta, you wont get the release version. The second I opted out, it started to update!

Hope this helps someone else out there....
